languages.text: "Впрочем, нам в любом случае стоит разгерметизировать все отсеки кроме главного. Тогда у заговорщиков не останется иных вариантов, кроме как попытаться восстановить работу станции с помощью главного когитатора. Вот здесь-то мы их и встретим".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, нам в любом случае стоит разгерметизировать все отсеки кроме главного. Тогда у заговорщиков не останется иных вариантов, кроме как попытаться восстановить работу станции с помощью главного когитатора. Вот здесь-то мы их и встретим".

languages.text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, нам в любом случае стоит разгерметизировать все отсеки кроме главного. Тогда у заговорщиков не останется иных вариантов, кроме как попытаться восстановить работу станции с помощью главного когитатора. Вот здесь-то мы их и встретим".

traits.locale_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

"Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

"Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

"Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

"Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

"Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

languages.text: « Dans tous les cas, nous devrions dépressuriser tous les compartiments à l'exception du principal. Ainsi, les conspirateurs n'auront d'autre choix que de tenter de rétablir les systèmes de la station à l'aide du cogitateur central. Et c'est là que nous les affronterons. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

traits.locale_text: « Dans tous les cas, nous devrions dépressuriser tous les compartiments à l'exception du principal. Ainsi, les conspirateurs n'auront d'autre choix que de tenter de rétablir les systèmes de la station à l'aide du cogitateur central. Et c'est là que nous les affronterons. »

languages.text: “无论您打算怎么做，我们都应该给主船舱之外的所有舱室减压。这样一来，那些阴谋分子便别无选择，只能尝试通过主沉思者来恢复空间站的系统。这样一来，我们就会和他们在那里碰面。”
languages.original_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

traits.locale_text: “无论您打算怎么做，我们都应该给主船舱之外的所有舱室减压。这样一来，那些阴谋分子便别无选择，只能尝试通过主思考器来恢复空间站的系统。这样一来，我们就会和他们在那里碰面。”

languages.text: 「どのような行動をお取りになるにせよ、主要区画を除くすべての区画を減圧すべきでしょう。そうすれば、共謀者たちは考算機を使ってステーションのシステムを復旧させるしかなくなります。その時、彼らと交戦するのです」
languages.original_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

traits.locale_text: 「どのような行動をお取りになるにせよ、主要区画を除くすべての区画を減圧すべきでしょう。そうすれば、共謀者たちは考算機を使ってステーションのシステムを復旧させるしかなくなります。その時、彼らと交戦するのです」

languages.text: "Für welchen Weg Ihr Euch auch entscheidet, wir sollten in allen Abteilen außer dem Hauptabteil den Druckabgleich abschalten. So bleibt den Verschwörer keine andere Möglichkeit, als zu versuchen, die Systeme der Station mithilfe des Hauptcogitators wieder hochzufahren. Und genau dort werden wir sie stellen."
languages.original_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

traits.locale_text: "Für welchen Weg Ihr Euch auch entscheidet, wir sollten in allen Abteilen außer dem Hauptabteil den Druckabgleich abschalten. So bleibt den Verschwörer keine andere Möglichkeit, als zu versuchen, die Systeme der Station mithilfe des Hauptcogitators wieder hochzufahren. Und genau dort werden wir sie stellen."

languages.text: «En cualquier caso, deberíamos despresurizar todos los compartimentos salvo el principal. De ese modo los conspiradores no tendrán más remedio que tratar de restablecer los sistemas de la estación usando el cogitador principal. Y ahí es donde nos enfrentaremos a ellos».
languages.original_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier caso, deberíamos despresurizar todos los compartimentos salvo el principal. De ese modo los conspiradores no tendrán más remedio que tratar de restablecer los sistemas de la estación usando el cogitador principal. Y ahí es donde nos enfrentaremos a ellos».

languages.text: "Seçiminiz her ne olursa olsun, ana kompartıman hariç tüm kompartımanların basıncını boşaltmalıyız. Böylece komplocular, ana kavramsayarı kullanarak istasyonun sistemlerini yeniden başlatmaya çalışmak zorunda kalır. Biz de orada onlarla yüzleşiriz."
languages.original_text: "Whatever course of action you choose, we should depressurise all compartments except for the main one. That way the conspirators will have no choice but to try and restore the station's systems using the main cogitator. And that is where we will engage them."

traits.locale_text: "Seçiminiz her ne olursa olsun, ana kompartıman hariç tüm kompartımanların basıncını boşaltmalıyız. Böylece komplocular, ana kavramsayarı kullanarak istasyonun sistemlerini yeniden başlatmaya çalışmak zorunda kalır. İşte biz de onlarla orada yüzleşiriz."
